Title: Relates to enforcement of the freshwater wetland law
Summary: Relates to enforcement of the freshwater wetlands law; requires restoration of areas adjacent to wetlands by those persons who, following procedures set forth in law, have been directed to cease violation and to restore the affected wetlands.
LawCode: Amd ยง71-2303, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to enforcement of the freshwater wetland law
